title: Have I Not Called You Presentation
The Gospel of Grace - Peace with God
meta: 50-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-2 featuring the Peace Child story, our legal standing before God, and transformation through grace. Perfect for teaching or preaching this powerful message.
speaker: Based on sermon transcript

title: Gospel of Grace Summary - Peace Child
meta: 22-slide summary presentation focusing on the Six Pillars of Grace, practical applications, and prayer points. Concise version perfect for prayer meetings and small groups.
speaker: Summary Version

title: Additional Weekly Prayer Points
meta: 15-slide presentation focused on intercessory prayer for America, Harvest Intercontinental Ministries, and newly planted churches in Canada and Ethiopia.
